The: destroyed from within" wording appeared in the early 2000s and has been presented as authentic in newspaper articles, letters-to-the-editor, editorials, online compendiums of quotations, and even entered into the official Congressional record on three occasions.
Lincoln did not write or utter the words: 3. The PragerU meme acknowledged that it used a paraphrased synopsis of something Lincoln said rather than his actual words, while the inflammatory April 2019 meme contained no such disclaimer.
